response.overview: In a sultry cat-and-mouse fantasy, Ukrainian vixen Viks Angel blurs the lines between perp and police officer. Don’t let her name and innocent, wide-eyed charm fool you – this brunette bombshell is up to no good, and she knows exactly what she’s doing. Dressed to provoke in a playful cop’s uniform – scandalously short miniskirt, tight crop top, and a cute cap – Viks steps into a provocative game of roleplay that’s equal parts punishment and pleasure. Inside a private playroom, she takes control and surrenders it all at once, slipping between the roles of the lawbreaker and the seductive authority tasked with keeping her in line. Every sultry glance and teasing move is on full display – and she loves knowing she’s being watched. When she crawls into a lavish, intimate cell, it’s not out of guilt, but pure temptation. What’s her crime? She won’t say. But one look at her and it’s clear – she won’t be mending her bad-gal ways just yet...
response.title: Under Surveillance 2
